code: import{tz}from"moment-timezone";export var TIMEZONE="Asia/Singapore";export var formatDate=function formatDate(dateString){if(!dateString)return null;var date=new Date(dateString);return tz(date,TIMEZONE).format("MMM YYYY").toUpperCase();};export var formatDateFullMonth=function formatDateFullMonth(dateString){if(!dateString)return null;var date=new Date(dateString);return tz(date,TIMEZONE).format("MMMM YYYY").toUpperCase();};
